alert.note: Alert for Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 12:26AM CDT until June 08 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Tom Green County in west central Texas... * Until 130 AM CDT. * At 1226 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Christoval, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Christoval around 1235 AM CDT. Twin Buttes Reservoir around 1240 AM CDT. Lake Nasworthy around 1250 AM CDT. San Angelo and Goodfellow Air Force Base around 105 AM CDT. Wall around 110 AM CDT. Vancourt around 120 AM CDT. Veribest around 125 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
